<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heroic Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1443) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

The blood of heroes courses through your veins, and you inspire your allies to dig deep and find a new level of resolve. You grant up to 10 willing creatures within 30 feet the effects of a 6th-level [_zealous conviction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=378), though the effect automatically ends on a target if you give that target a command they would normally find repugnant. This action has the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait or [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait, depending on how you inspire your allies.
name: Heroic Presence
